about.details:
Nupur Recyclers is engaged in metal scrap processing & recycling. The company is involved in the importing, manufacturing, and trading of non-ferrous metal scraps such as shredded zinc scrap, zinc die cast scrap, zurik ss scrap, and aluminium zorba grades. The company acts as an intermediary in the metals scrap supply chain where they import scrap metals from various suppliers and supply the same to customers in the Metal Business.

The company has also added two new verticals of installation of charging stations in the Delhi NCR Region in collaboration with EVi Tech. Its also extracts Lithium-Ion, Cobalt, and Black Mass from the used mobile phone batteries and processes them to be used in refurbishments. The company derives the majority of its revenue from Zurik products.

Competitive Strengths:

  • Positive cash flow of the company ·
  • Excellent network management & logistics
  • Experienced and professional team

faqs.question: What is the Nupur Recyclers IPO?
faqs.answer:
Nupur Recyclers IPO is a SME IPO of equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹34.20 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹60 per share. The minimum order quantity is 2000.

The IPO opens on December 13, 2021, and closes on December 15, 2021.

Skyline Financial Services Private Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on NSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Nupur Recyclers IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Nupur Recyclers IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Nupur Recyclers IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Nupur Recyclers IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Nupur Recyclers IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Nupur Recyclers IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Nupur Recyclers IPO opens on December 13, 2021 and closes on December 15, 2021.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Nupur Recyclers IPO?
faqs.answer: Nupur Recyclers IPO lot size is 2000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,20,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Nupur Recyclers IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Nupur Recyclers IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.
